name: Deathly Overflow
title: Consecrated Horned Crocodile: Deathly Overflow
desc: "To devour, to merge, to seek yet another immortal carcass â€” the Consecrated Beasts enact this evolution in ceaseless repetition. Little do they know that the end of this cycle may never come..."
in_play_description: When your Consecrated Horned Crocodile, who has this card equipped, is on the field and after you use Bonecruncher's Energy Block, heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 1 HP.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Consecrated Horned Crocodile at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip to your Consecrated Horned Crocodile.
When played: Create 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and add it to your Hand.
When your Consecrated Horned Crocodile, who has this card equipped, is on the field and after you use Bonecruncher's Energy Block, heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 1 HP.
(You must have Consecrated Horned Crocodile in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
